Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

TransferSwitch.description: This is the schema definition a power Transfer Switch.
TransferSwitch.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a power Transfer Switch for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Alarms.description: Contains the naivgation pointer to the equipment Alarm collection.
Alarms.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type AlarmCollection that contains the alarms for the equipment.

AssetTag.description: The actual Asset Tag of TransferSwitch.
AssetTag.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Asset Tag of TransferSwitch.

ConnectedToSourceA.description: The actual Connected to Source A boolean value of TransferSwitch.
ConnectedToSourceA.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Connected to Source A boolean value of TransferSwitch.

ConnectedToSourceB.description: The actual Connected to Source B boolean value of TransferSwitch.
ConnectedToSourceB.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Connected to Source B boolean value of TransferSwitch.

DateOfManufacture.description: The date of manufacture of TransferSwitch.
DateOfManufacture.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual date of manufacture of TransferSwitch.

FirmwareRevision.description: The actual Firmware Revision of TransferSwitch.
FirmwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Firmware Revision of TransferSwitch.

HardwareRevision.description: The actual Hardware Revision of TransferSwitch.
HardwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Hardware Revision of TransferSwitch.

Manufacturer.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Manufacturer of TransferSwitch.

Model.description: The actual Model Number of TransferSwitch.
Model.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Model Number of TransferSwitch.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PartNumber.description: The actual Part Number of TransferSwitch.
PartNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Part Number of TransferSwitch.

PhysicalLocation.description: The actual Physical Location of TransferSwitch.
PhysicalLocation.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Physical Location of TransferSwitch.

Sensors.description: The naivgation pointer to the collection of sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.
Sensors.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type SensorCollection that contains the sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.

SerialNumber.description: The actual Serial Number of TransferSwitch.
SerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Serial Number of TransferSwitch.

SourceBAvailable.description: The actual Source B Available boolean value of TransferSwitch.
SourceBAvailable.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Source B Available boolean value of TransferSwitch.

SummaryAlarmOn.description: The actual Summary Alarm On boolean value of TransferSwitch.
SummaryAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Summary Alarm On boolean value of TransferSwitch.

TransferSwitchMode.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Mode of TransferSwitch.

TransferSwitchType.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Type of TransferSwitch.

TriggeredAlarms.description: Contains the array of 0 or more triggered alarms.
TriggeredAlarms.longDescription: This array shall contain the set of Members of the Alarm Collection which have an 'AlarmStatus' of 'Triggered'.

title: #TransferSwitch.v0_2_0.TransferSwitch
